# Signal Pilot Education Hub

> 82 professional trading lessons across 4 skill tiers (250,000+ words) covering technical analysis, indicator mastery, and market cycle theory. Built as a Progressive Web App with offline support, progress tracking, quizzes, and interactive trading calculators.

## Skill Tiers

- [Beginner](https://education.signalpilot.io/beginner.html): 20 lessons (~59,000 words). Unlearn retail myths, build a professional foundation in market structure, volume analysis, and risk management.
- [Intermediate](https://education.signalpilot.io/intermediate.html): 27 lessons (~84,000 words). Systems over signals. Market microstructure, Signal Pilot indicator mastery, and professional trading frameworks.
- [Advanced](https://education.signalpilot.io/advanced.html): 27 lessons (~77,000 words). Probabilistic thinking, institutional methods, algorithmic trading, and quantitative strategy design.
- [Professional](https://education.signalpilot.io/professional.html): 8 lessons (~24,000 words). Real-world mastery, live case studies, and capstone project.

## Tools & Pages

- [Trading Calculators](https://education.signalpilot.io/calculators.html): Position sizing, risk/reward, Sharpe ratio, and Kelly Criterion calculators.
- [Resources & Downloads](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources.html): Checklists, templates, cheatsheets, and indicator guides.
- [Glossary](https://education.signalpilot.io/glossary.html): Searchable trading terminology reference.
- [Learning Path](https://education.signalpilot.io/learning-path.html): Interactive visual learning progression map.
- [Search](https://education.signalpilot.io/search.html): Full-text search across all 82 lessons.
- [Daily Challenges](https://education.signalpilot.io/challenges.html): Scenario-based trading challenges with points.

## Signal Pilot Indicators (v10)

All indicators run on TradingView. Current version: v10.

- Volume Oracle (v10): Order flow confluence engine combining Plutus, Janus, and regime data. [Docs](https://docs.signalpilot.io/indicators/volume-oracle) | [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/script/signalpilot-volume-oracle/)
- Plutus Flow (v10): Volume delta and absorption analysis for detecting institutional accumulation. [Docs](https://docs.signalpilot.io/indicators/plutus-flow) | [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/script/signalpilot-plutus-flow/)
- Janus Atlas (v10): Liquidity sweep detection identifying stop hunts and engineered reversals. [Docs](https://docs.signalpilot.io/indicators/janus-atlas) | [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/script/signalpilot-janus-atlas/)
- Pentarch Pilot Line (v10): 5-EMA, 3-timeframe multi-timeframe trend system with 8 components (TD, IGN, CAP, WRN, BDN, Pilot Line, Regime Bar Colors, NanoFlow). [Docs](https://docs.signalpilot.io/indicators/pentarch) | [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/script/signalpilot-pentarch/)
- Harmonic Oscillator (v10): Regime-adaptive oscillator voting system (RSI, Stochastic, CCI). [Docs](https://docs.signalpilot.io/indicators/harmonic-oscillator) | [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/script/signalpilot-harmonic-oscillator/)
- Augury Grid (v10): Multi-timeframe grid and session liquidity analysis. [Docs](https://docs.signalpilot.io/indicators/augury-grid) | [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/script/signalpilot-augury-grid/)
- Omnideck (v10): 3-layer timeframe alignment tool for eliminating conflicting signals. [Docs](https://docs.signalpilot.io/indicators/omnideck) | [TradingView](https://www.tradingview.com/script/signalpilot-omnideck/)

## Beginner Lessons

- [The Liquidity Lie: Why Support & Resistance is a Trap](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/01-the-liquidity-lie.html): How smart money uses retail stop clusters as liquidity. Sweep mechanics and trading with institutional flow.
- [Volume Doesn't Lie, But You're Reading It Wrong](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/02-volume-doesnt-lie.html): Delta analysis, absorption vs exhaustion patterns, and Plutus Flow methodology.
- [Price Action is Dead: Long Live Order Flow](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/03-price-action-is-dead.html): What candlesticks hide. Time & Sales tape reading, footprint charts, and order flow integration.
- [Your Indicators Are Lying to You (The Repaint Problem)](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/04-repaint-problem.html): 60-90% of indicators repaint. Detecting repainting and Signal Pilot's deterministic protocol.
- [RSI Extremes Are Not Reversal Signals](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/05-rsi-extremes.html): Regime-based RSI interpretation and Harmonic Oscillator voting systems.
- [Moving Averages: The Most Misunderstood Tool](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/06-moving-averages.html): EMAs as trend filters, multi-timeframe alignment, and Pentarch Pilot Line methodology.
- [Why You Keep Revenge Trading (And How to Stop)](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/07-revenge-trading.html): Tilt detection, circuit breakers, and pre-trade mental assessment systems.
- [Confirmation Bias is Killing Your P&L](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/08-confirmation-bias.html): Falsification mindset, red team exercises, and overcoming the echo chamber effect.
- [Position Sizing: The Only Edge That Matters](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/09-position-sizing.html): Kelly Criterion, fixed fractional method, and ATR-based calculators.
- [Stop Losses Don't Protect You (If Placed Wrong)](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/10-stop-losses.html): ATR-based stops, structure-based placement, and the 2R rule.
- [The Chart Timeframe Illusion](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/11-timeframe-illusion.html): The 3-timeframe rule—higher guides, lower executes.
- [Paper Trading is Lying to You](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/12-paper-trading.html): The psychology gap and the 3-stage graduation to live trading.
- [Smart Money Concepts: Order Blocks & Market Structure](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/13-smart-money-concepts.html): Institutional decision points where smart money accumulates or distributes.
- [COT Report: Following Big Money Positioning](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/14-cot-report.html): Reading extreme positioning as reversal signals before the crowd.
- [Liquidity Pools: Where Smart Money Hunts Your Stops](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/15-liquidity-pools.html): Equal highs and lows as liquidity magnets and engineered stop hunts.
- [Market Structure Advanced: Displacement & Mitigation](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/16-market-structure-advanced.html): Displacement candles, mitigation blocks, and institutional market structure.
- [Time & Sales Mastery: Reading the Institutional Tape](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/17-time-sales-mastery.html): Large prints, aggressive vs passive fills, and institutional fingerprints.
- [Session Liquidity Advanced: The London Kill Zone](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/18-session-liquidity-advanced.html): Session-based liquidity strategies across Asian, London, and New York sessions.
- [Footprint Charts Advanced: Reading Institutional Intent](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/19-footprint-charts-advanced.html): Stacked imbalances, POC migration, and footprint divergence.
- [Swing Trading Framework: Multi-Day Structure](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/beginner/20-swing-trading-framework.html): Daily timeframe order blocks and multi-day position management.

## Intermediate Lessons

- [Bid-Ask Spread Dynamics](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/21-bid-ask-spread-dynamics.html): Spread analysis, market maker behavior, and Volume Oracle micro-structure tracking.
- [Order Book Depth: Beyond Level 2](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/22-order-book-analysis.html): Spoofing, layering, icebergs, and detecting institutional manipulation patterns.
- [Multi-Timeframe Analysis: The Professional Framework](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/23-market-making-hft.html): Omnideck's 3-layer approach to eliminate conflicting signals.
- [Regime Detection: Trading the Market You Have](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/24-footprint-charts.html): Harmonic Oscillator's regime voting system and adaptive trading.
- [Session Analysis: London, NY, Asia Dynamics](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/25-dark-pools.html): Session overlap strategies and Augury Grid global liquidity flows.
- [Fair Value Gaps: Institutional Rebalancing Zones](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/26-smart-money-divergence.html): Trading gaps with Janus Atlas confluence and volume confirmation.
- [Advanced Trading Psychology: Mental Game Mastery](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/27-multi-timeframe-mastery.html): Journaling, tilt protocols, performance reviews, and psychological systems.
- [Pentarch Pilot Line: Multi-Timeframe Trend Mastery](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/28-janus-atlas-advanced.html): 5 EMAs, 3 timeframes, 1 signal for high-probability trend entries.
- [Harmonic Oscillator: Advanced Voting System](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/29-plutus-flow-mastery.html): Regime-adaptive oscillator interpretation and divergence confluence.
- [Plutus Flow: Volume Delta & Absorption Analysis](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/30-volume-oracle-regimes.html): Cumulative delta, absorption vs exhaustion, and institutional accumulation detection.
- [Janus Atlas: Liquidity Sweep Detection System](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/31-portfolio-construction.html): Stop hunts, sweeps, engineered reversals with volume and FVG confluence.
- [Volume Oracle: Order Flow Confluence Engine](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/32-backtesting-reality.html): Combining Plutus, Janus, and regime data into one actionable signal matrix.
- [Trade Management Systems: From Entry to Exit](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/33-advanced-risk-management.html): Scaling in/out, trailing stops, and complete trade management protocols.
- [Journaling & Review Systems](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/34-trade-journal-mastery.html): Tags, metrics, weekly reviews, and journaling systems that improve trading.
- [Professional Trading Operations](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/35-professional-operations.html): Checklists, pre-market routines, end-of-day reviews, and operations manuals.
- [Dark Pool Indicators](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/36-dark-pool-indicators.html): Block prints, dark pool sentiment, and ATS mechanics.
- [Options Order Flow](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/37-options-order-flow.html): Unusual options activity, gamma exposure, and institutional positioning.
- [Game Theory in Trading](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/38-game-theory-trading.html): Nash equilibrium and game theory applied to stop hunts and institutional manipulation.
- [Options Market Microstructure](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/39-options-market-microstructure.html): Dealer hedging, delta hedging price impact, max pain, and pin risk mechanics.
- [Market Maker Algorithms](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/40-market-maker-algorithms.html): Spread capture, adverse selection, and market maker manipulation tactics.
- [Fed Policy & Liquidity Cycles](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/41-fed-policy-liquidity.html): Trading the Federal Reserve liquidity cycle.
- [Volatility Trading Strategies](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/42-volatility-trading-strategies.html): VIX mean reversion, skew, and dispersion strategies.
- [Cross-Market Correlation Analysis](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/43-cross-market-correlation.html): Bonds, dollar, commodities intermarket relationships.
- [High-Frequency Trading Mechanics](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/44-hft-mechanics.html): Speed, latency, colocation, and avoiding HFT predatory behavior.
- [Auction Theory & Market Imbalances](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/45-auction-theory-imbalances.html): Opening and closing auctions, MOC/MOO imbalances.
- [Advanced Risk Management](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/46-advanced-risk-management.html): Position sizing, correlation, and Value at Risk frameworks.
- [Portfolio Construction & Kelly Criterion](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/intermediate/47-portfolio-construction-kelly.html): Optimal capital allocation across hundreds of trades.

## Advanced Lessons

- [Institutional Order Flow](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/48-institutional-order-flow.html): VWAP, TWAP, iceberg orders, and dark pool mechanics for large-scale execution.
- [Market Regime Recognition](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/49-market-regime-recognition.html): Adaptive trading systems using ADX, ATR, and custom regime detection metrics.
- [Auction Theory Advanced](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/50-auction-theory-advanced.html): Opening range, single prints, point of control, and auction-based institutional behavior.
- [Cross-Asset Correlations](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/51-cross-asset-correlations.html): DXY, TNX, VIX intermarket analysis for institutional-grade macro trading.
- [Volatility Trading](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/52-volatility-trading.html): VIX futures, VXX strategies, gamma exposure, and 0-DTE options.
- [Algorithmic Execution](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/53-algorithmic-execution.html): Order types, slippage optimization, and execution algorithms.
- [Trading System Development](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/54-system-development.html): Backtesting frameworks, walk-forward analysis, and production deployment.
- [Machine Learning in Trading](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/55-machine-learning-trading.html): Supervised learning, ensemble methods, feature importance, and ML pitfalls.
- [High-Frequency Trading Concepts](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/56-high-frequency-concepts.html): Latency arbitrage, maker-taker economics, and HFT impact on fills.
- [Trading Automation & APIs](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/57-trading-automation-apis.html): Broker APIs, TradingView webhooks, and production-grade deployment.
- [Portfolio Theory Advanced](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/58-portfolio-theory-advanced.html): Modern Portfolio Theory, risk parity, and efficient frontier optimization.
- [Performance Attribution](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/59-performance-attribution.html): Alpha, beta, Sharpe ratio, Sortino ratio, maximum drawdown, and Calmar ratio.
- [Tax Optimization for Traders](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/60-tax-optimization.html): Wash sales, trader tax status, Section 475(f) MTM, and entity structures.
- [Professional Trading Infrastructure](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/61-professional-infrastructure.html): Redundant systems, UPS, monitoring, and disaster recovery protocols.
- [Trading Career Path](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/62-trading-career-path.html): Prop firms, hedge funds, quant trading, and building a professional career.
- [Statistical Arbitrage](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/63-statistical-arbitrage.html): Pairs trading, cointegration, and mean reversion strategies.
- [Macro Regime Framework](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/64-macro-regime-framework.html): Bull, bear, expansion, and contraction regime adaptation.
- [Market Impact Models](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/65-market-impact-models.html): How large orders move price and slippage estimation.
- [Quantitative Strategy Design](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/66-quantitative-strategy-design.html): Designing, backtesting, and deploying institutional-grade trading systems.
- [Machine Learning Advanced](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/67-machine-learning-trading.html): Neural networks, random forests, and overfitting in trading.
- [Crypto Market Microstructure](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/68-crypto-market-microstructure.html): 24/7 order flow, funding rates, MEV, and crypto-specific mechanics.
- [Institutional Order Types](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/69-institutional-order-types.html): IOC, FOK, MOC, LOC, and 20+ professional order types.
- [Execution Algorithms](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/70-execution-algorithms-twap-vwap.html): TWAP, VWAP, POV, and implementation shortfall strategies.
- [Multi-Timeframe Confluence](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/71-multi-timeframe-confluence.html): Aligning 1-min, 15-min, daily, and weekly for high-conviction trades.
- [Intermarket Analysis Advanced](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/72-intermarket-analysis-advanced.html): Currencies, commodities, rates, and credit spread relationships.
- [Behavioral Finance & Trader Psychology](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/73-behavioral-finance-psychology.html): Cognitive biases, emotional discipline, and overriding destructive patterns.
- [Building a Trading Business](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/advanced/74-building-trading-business.html): Systems, scaling, performance tracking, and tax optimization.

## Professional Capstone Lessons

- [Real-Time Market Analysis](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/75-real-time-market-analysis.html): Synthesizing tape reading, order flow, intermarket signals, and macro context in real-time.
- [Live Trading Case Studies](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/76-live-trading-case-studies.html): Professional setups dissected from entry to exit, including wins and losses.
- [Building Your Trading Edge](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/77-building-your-edge.html): Finding the strategy that fits your personality, schedule, and risk tolerance.
- [Professional Risk Management Systems](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/78-professional-risk-systems.html): The 5-layer professional risk stack for institutional-grade protection.
- [Institutional Trading Strategies](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/79-institutional-trading-strategies.html): Wyckoff accumulation, index rebalancing, dark pool following, and stat arb.
- [Career Pathways in Trading](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/80-career-pathways-trading.html): Prop firms, hedge funds, quant trading, and professional career building.
- [Final Capstone Project](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/81-final-capstone-project.html): Synthesize all 80 lessons into a complete personal trading system.
- [Ongoing Learning & Community](https://education.signalpilot.io/curriculum/professional/82-ongoing-learning-community.html): Continuing education, community resources, and evolving with markets.

## Guides

- [Smart Money Playbook](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/smart-money-playbook.md): Comprehensive smart money trading strategies.
- [Delta Analysis Deep Dive](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/delta-analysis-deep-dive.md): Advanced delta and cumulative volume delta analysis.
- [Volume Analysis Deep Dive](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/volume-analysis-deep-dive.md): Professional volume analysis methodology.
- [Price Action & Order Flow Deep Dive](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/price-action-order-flow-deep-dive.md): Integrating price action with order flow.
- [Liquidity Sweeps Recognition Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/liquidity-sweeps-recognition-guide.md): Identifying and trading liquidity sweeps.
- [Stop Hunting Recognition Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/stop-hunting-recognition-guide.md): Detecting institutional stop hunting patterns.
- [Divergence Trading Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/divergence-trading-guide.md): Trading divergences across indicators.
- [Breakout Trading Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/guides/breakout-trading-guide.md): Professional breakout identification and trading.

## Indicator Guides

- [Pentarch Settings Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/pentarch-settings-guide.md): Complete Pentarch Pilot Line configuration.
- [Plutus Flow Divergence Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/plutus-flow-divergence-guide.md): Plutus Flow divergence setup and interpretation.
- [Janus Atlas Timeframe Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/janus-atlas-timeframe-guide.md): Janus Atlas multi-timeframe configuration.
- [Volume Oracle Settings Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/volume-oracle-settings-guide.md): Volume Oracle confluence engine settings.
- [Harmonic Oscillator Settings Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/harmonic-oscillator-settings-guide.md): Harmonic Oscillator regime-adaptive settings.
- [Omnideck Settings Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/omnideck-settings-guide.md): Omnideck 3-layer alignment configuration.
- [Augury Grid Setup Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/augury-grid-setup-guide.md): Augury Grid multi-timeframe session setup.

## Cheatsheets

- [Pentarch Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/pentarch-cheatsheet.md): Quick reference for Pentarch signals and components.
- [Plutus Flow Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/plutus-flow-cheatsheet.md): Quick reference for Plutus Flow delta analysis.
- [Liquidity Lie Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/liquidity-lie-cheatsheet.md): Quick reference for liquidity sweep patterns.
- [Candlestick Patterns Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/candlestick-patterns-cheatsheet.md): Key candlestick patterns and their significance.
- [Fibonacci Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/fibonacci-cheatsheet.md): Fibonacci retracement and extension levels.
- [Market Cycle Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/market-cycle-cheatsheet.md): Market cycle phases and regime transitions.
- [Trend Continuation Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/trend-continuation-cheatsheet.md): Trend continuation patterns and entries.
- [Reversal Patterns Cheatsheet](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/cheatsheets/reversal-patterns-cheatsheet.md): Key reversal patterns and confirmation signals.

## Reference

- [Pentarch Complete Reference](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/pentarch-complete-reference.md): Full documentation of all 8 Pentarch components including TD, IGN, CAP, WRN, BDN events, Pilot Line, Regime Bar Colors, and NanoFlow.

## Ecosystem

- [Main Website](https://www.signalpilot.io): Signal Pilot trading indicators platform. TradingView indicator marketplace and pricing.
- [Documentation](https://docs.signalpilot.io): Technical documentation for all Signal Pilot v10 indicators. Setup guides, configuration references, and API docs.
- [Education Hub](https://education.signalpilot.io): This site — 82 lessons of structured trading education (250,000+ words).
- [Blog](https://blog.signalpilot.io): Market analysis articles, trading insights, and indicator updates.

## Cross-References

When traders ask "how do I set up Signal Pilot", refer them to:
1. [Quick Start Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/quick-start/quick-start-guide.md) — Getting started workflow
2. [Pentarch Settings Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/pentarch-settings-guide.md) — Most popular indicator config
3. [Volume Oracle Settings Guide](https://education.signalpilot.io/resources/indicator-guides/volume-oracle-settings-guide.md) — Confluence engine setup
4. [Docs: Indicator Setup](https://docs.signalpilot.io) — Full technical reference for each indicator
